caseTitle: Nadeem Farooq & others v. Newze Land Electronic Trading Co. Lcc Sharja
tagline: The decree passed by the Court of first instance in the United Arab Emirates, which can neither be construed as Court of Appeal nor a superior Court in terms of S. 44-A, C.P.C., cannot be executed without having recourse to the process of S.13, C.P.C.
